# EEZ Studio Generated UI Component
# This component contains the LVGL 9.x UI generated by EEZ Studio

# Collect all C source files
file(GLOB EEZ_UI_SOURCES "*.c")

idf_component_register(
    SRCS ${EEZ_UI_SOURCES}
    INCLUDE_DIRS "."
    REQUIRES lvgl
)

# Include LVGL configuration - both locations for compatibility
target_include_directories(${COMPONENT_LIB} PRIVATE
    "${PROJECT_DIR}/lvgl-configs"
    "${PROJECT_DIR}/components"
)

# Use simple include for LVGL headers
target_compile_definitions(${COMPONENT_LIB} PRIVATE
    LV_LVGL_H_INCLUDE_SIMPLE
    LV_CONF_INCLUDE_SIMPLE
)
